user_query: I am a 25 year old male from Karnataka, belonging to General category. My annual household income is Rs. 500000. I am a Self-employed/Business running a Micro business. My specific requirements are: Business Loan, Equipment Purchase.  Please suggest government schemes that I am eligible for, particularly related to my requirements.
